# Support

We're here to help! Here are the best ways to get support for the SRE Playbooks.

## ðŸ†˜ Getting Help

### Quick Questions

- **GitHub Discussions**: [Ask a question](https://github.com/Scoutflo/scoutflo-SRE-Playbooks/discussions/categories/q-a)
- **GitHub Issues**: [Create a question issue](https://github.com/Scoutflo/scoutflo-SRE-Playbooks/issues/new?template=question.md)

### Bug Reports

- **GitHub Issues**: [Report a bug](https://github.com/Scoutflo/scoutflo-SRE-Playbooks/issues/new?template=bug_report.md)
- Include as much detail as possible about the issue

### Feature Requests

- **GitHub Issues**: [Request a feature](https://github.com/Scoutflo/scoutflo-SRE-Playbooks/issues/new?template=feature_request.md)
- **GitHub Discussions**: [Share ideas](https://github.com/Scoutflo/scoutflo-SRE-Playbooks/discussions/categories/ideas-suggestions)

## âš¡ Response Times

We aim to respond to:
- **Critical Issues**: Within 24 hours
- **Bug Reports**: Within 48 hours
- **Feature Requests**: Within 1 week
- **Questions**: Within 2-3 business days

## ðŸ”’ Security Issues

For security vulnerabilities, please see [SECURITY.md](../SECURITY.md).

**Do NOT** open public issues for security vulnerabilities.

---

**Thank you for using SRE Playbooks!**
